item.description:
Dear fellow Social Fun members,

 

Do you like active fun & adventure? Imagine playing dodgeball when you were a kid.

 

For this event we will be joining the Boston Volunteers.

Learn more about the Boston Volunteers: NY Adventure to Rebuild Jessica's home

 

Fellow Social Fun members, I hope you are enjoying the spring. Last time we had a dodge ball night, people had lot of fun. Per request, we are organizing one more Dodge Ball night very soon.

Some of us had attended the dodge ball few weeks ago  and we had a blast, that's the best $10 we have ever spent.

Where? Dodge Ball of Boston, 1 Broadway, Arlington, MA

1 mile from Davis Sq Redline T and Alewife T Stations

When? 26-Apr-13 , 7 30 PM

Expectations: We will be playing against each other with a soft dodge ball (off course everybody looks familiar, we all volunteer together). ALL LEVELS WELCOME.  We will be playing on a padded floor, wearing socks. The arena is air conditioned and is smaller than a typical dodgeball court. Dodgeball is a lot of fun, so be sure to join us. It doesn't matter if you haven't played since you were a kid, everyone is welcome to participate and have fun!

Minimum Entrance Fee : $5 (This fee goes to the Dodgeball of Boston)

Members are suggested (not Mandatory) to give additional donations to Boston Volunteers Doggy Fun run we are organizing this summer ($5 may be or more, We take $1 bills too..)

Learn More: www.doggyfunrun.org

After dodgeball, we will head for drinks/appetizers at nearby Joe Sent Me, 2388 Mass Ave, Cambridge.

This will be a joint event with other meet up groups.

IMPORTANT:
Please be sure to bring socks with you in order to play!

As always, feel free to contact me any time if you need directions or additional information @505-301-6872

Thank you and see you guys soon

Phani

The Boston Volunteers
Big enough to deliver, small enough to care
Learn more: www.BostonVolunteer.org

 

P.S. Learn more about the Boston Volunteers: NY Adventure to Rebuild Jessica's home
item.name: Popular Dodgeball Night: All Levels Welcome!
